A view of available sector classification datasets

Source: R/sector_classification_df.R
sector_classification_df.Rd

A view of available sector classification datasets

sector_classification_df()

Value

A tibble::tibble(). The column code_system names one of the classification systems that 2dii uses. All other columns are defined at data_dictionary().

See also

data_dictionary().

Other datasets for bridging sector classification codes: classification_bridge

Examples

sector_classification_df()
#> # A tibble: 2,600 x 4
#>    sector       borderline code  code_system
#>    <chr>        <lgl>      <chr> <chr>      
#>  1 not in scope FALSE      A     ISIC       
#>  2 not in scope FALSE      1     ISIC       
#>  3 not in scope FALSE      11    ISIC       
#>  4 not in scope FALSE      111   ISIC       
#>  5 not in scope FALSE      112   ISIC       
#>  6 not in scope FALSE      113   ISIC       
#>  7 not in scope FALSE      114   ISIC       
#>  8 not in scope FALSE      115   ISIC       
#>  9 not in scope FALSE      116   ISIC       
#> 10 not in scope FALSE      119   ISIC       
#> # … with 2,590 more rows

data_dictionary() %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    grepl("_classification", dataset),
    column %in% c("sector", "borderline", "code", "code_system")
 ) %>%
 dplyr::arrange(column)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 4
#>   dataset        column    typeof  definition                                   
#>   <chr>          <chr>     <chr>   <chr>                                        
#> 1 isic_classifi… borderli… logical Flag indicating if 2dii sector and classific…
#> 2 nace_classifi… borderli… logical Flag indicating if 2dii sector and classific…
#> 3 isic_classifi… code      charac… Original ISIC code                           
#> 4 nace_classifi… code      double  Formatted NACE code removing periods         
#> 5 isic_classifi… sector    charac… Associated 2dii sector                       
#> 6 nace_classifi… sector    charac… Associated 2dii sector
